DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study : -To evaluate long-term safety tolerability MT-1303 subject moderate severe active Crohn 's Disease（CD）
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study MT-1303 Subjects With Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: The subject complete 14 week Treatment Period double blind MT1303E13 study per Protocol . Permanent discontinuation study medication prior end treatment Visit MT1303E13
